com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUISecureCookieProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUISecureCookieProvider

    public interface ISCUISecureCookieProvider
extends ISCUISessionAware
    All application provided SecureCookieProvider will need to implement this class. It exposes the validateCookie() and setSecureCookie() methods.
    This provider is expected to handle the cookie management in case of secure Https connection. ISCUISecureCookieProvider is SessionAware which means that it is dependent on the Session validity.

    The default implementation for this interface is provided. com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.security.SCUISecureCookieProvider rasrinivasan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      ISCUISecureCookieProvider init() method will be called once when the Application's implementation of ISCUISecureCookieProvider is set.
      boolean isSecureConnection(SCUIContext uiContext)
      Utility to check if the HTTP request was made via a secure channel uiContext The current UI context True if the request was made via a secure channel, False otherwise
      void setSecureCookie(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method sets the cookie in a secure Https connection in the given UIContext.It will have the algorithm to generate unique cookie during secure Https connection.
      boolean validateCookie(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method validates the cookie in a secure Https connection set in the given UIContext.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions.ISCUISessionAware

        sessionDestroyed

      • init

        void init()

        boolean isSecureConnection(SCUIContext uiContext)

      • validateCookie

        boolean validateCookie(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method validates the cookie in a secure Https connection set in the given UIContext. If the cookie is invalid the session will be invalidated.
        Note: This method should invalidate the session if the cookie is not valid uiContext of the type SCUIContext False if actual validation fails, True in all other cases
